body.p: Why is the following statement true:

p.em: A muscle could not lift anything without being attached to a bone.

multiple_choice.choice: The bone forms the lever for the muscle to work on.
The bone forms the load of the lever.
The bone forms the effort of the lever that the muscle works on.
The bone forms the fulcrum of the lever.

response.feedback: Correct. The bone is a rigid structure that the muscle can work on to cause movement.
Incorrect. The bone is a rigid structure that forms the lever. The body weight is the load.
Incorrect. The bone is a rigid structure that forms the lever. The muscle creates the force.
Incorrect. The bone is a rigid structure that forms the lever. The joint is the fulcrum.
